summary: An Ordinance transferring the sum of Eight Hundred Sixty-two and 57/100 (862.57) Dollars, from Local Improvement District No. 1705 Fund, into the General Fund of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of reimbursing said General Fund, for the deficiency in the Fixed Estimate of said district, for the improvement of Kirkwood Place, and other streets and avenues in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 18140.
